sentences.english: We have special interest in your light industrial products.
sentences.chinese: 我们对你方轻工产品特别感兴趣。

sentences.english: We have targeted two principal market sectors with our equipment: agriculture and light industrial construction applications worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 公司的产品遍及世界农业和轻工业工程设备市场。

sentences.english: Pauticularly suitable for light industry, electronics and other products stored light.
sentences.chinese: 特别适合轻工业，电子电器等产品的存放。

sentences.english: Many young off-farm workers are busy working for orders of next year.
sentences.chinese: 众多来自农村的年轻工人们在赶制下一年的订单。

sentences.english: We wish to introduce ourselves to you as a stateoperated corporation dealing exclusively in light industrial goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们是专营轻工产品的国营公司。

sentences.english: Wr are a state-operated corporation handling light industrial products.
sentences.chinese: 我们是经营轻工业产品的国营公司。

sentences.english: Some countries envy us our rapid development of light industry.
sentences.chinese: 有些国家羡慕我国轻工业的飞速发展。

sentences.english: Fujian Jomoo Light Group Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 福建省九牧轻工集团有限公司。

sentences.english: The Chinese light industry was revitalized in the 1980's.
sentences.chinese: 中国轻工业在20世纪80年代重新振兴起来。

sentences.english: The light art design of engineering institute of Zhengzhou will be to graduate from in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 2005年毕业于郑州轻工业学院艺术设计系。

sentences.english: We have the pleasure of introducing ourselves to your as a state-operated corporation dealing exclusively in light industrial goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们有幸自荐，我们是一家专营轻工业品的有限公司。

sentences.english: Light industry is closely related to agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 轻工业和农业密切相关。

sentences.english: Our product range includes machine tools and light industrial products.
sentences.chinese: 我们的产品系列包括机床和轻工产品。

sentences.english: China National Light Import & Export Corporation Wants To open up a new market abroad for them.
sentences.chinese: 中国轻工业品进出口总公司想在国外打开市场。

sentences.english: I am responsible for exporting light industrial machinery to some Asian and European countries.
sentences.chinese: 我负责向一些亚洲和欧洲国家出口轻工业机械产品。

sentences.english: Lots and lots of light industrial products are sent to the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 大量轻工产品运往农村。

definition: chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
Shaanxi University of Science and Technology
pinyin: Shan3 xi1 Ke1 ji4 Da4 xue2

definition: vocational high school/abbr. to 技校[ji4 xiao4]
